choices.name: Magician: +1 dice pool modifier when casting Health spells, preparations, and rituals
Adept: Gain 1 free level of Analytics.

mentors.name: Raven
mentors.advantage: All: +2 dice for Con tests.
mentors.disadvantage: You must make a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test to avoid exploiting someone else's misfortune to your own advantage or to pull a clever trick or prank even if it's to the disadvantage of your friends.

choices.name: Magician: +2 dice for Manipulation spells
Adept: Free Traceless Walk and 1 level of Voice Control

mentors.name: Raven (Alt)
mentors.advantage: All: +2 dice pool modifier for knowledge skill tests.
mentors.disadvantage: Followers of Raven share their mentor's love of collecting. When presented with data, knowledge, or other gear that would be valuable (gamemaster's discretion), you must pass a Charisma + Willpower Test (3), or be unable to resist trying to acquiring it.

choices.name: Magician: +2 dice to Detection spells, preparations, and rituals.
Magician: +2 dice to summoning spirits if summoner also has Code of Honor: Harmony with Nature, The Shaman's Code and bargains with the summoned spirit.
Adept: 2 free levels of Enhanced Perception.

mentors.name: Sea
mentors.advantage: All: +2 dice for Swimming Tests.
mentors.disadvantage: You must make a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test to give away something you own or be charitable in some way.

choices.name: Magician: +2 dice summoning spirits of water
Adept: 1 free level of Improved Ability on an athletic skill

mentors.name: Seal
mentors.advantage: All: +2 dice pool modifier for Judge Intentions tests.
mentors.disadvantage: Seal has compassion, but she is lacking in tact dealing with the feelings of others. Whenever a follower of Seal gains insight into the emotional world of an other, it's difficult for him to respect private boundaries and not address the subject. In order to remain discreet in such situations, they must make a Charisma + Willpower (3) test. Glitches in social test are automatically critical.

choices.name: Magician: +2 dice summoning spirits of water.
Magician: +2 dice pool modifier when casting Illusion spells, preparations, and rituals
Adept: Gain the Astral Perception Power for free.

mentors.name: Seducer
mentors.advantage: All: +2 dice for Con Tests.
mentors.disadvantage: You must succeed in a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test to avoid pursuing a vice or indulgence (drugs, BTLs, sex, and so on) when it is made available.

choices.name: Magician: +2 dice for Illusion spells
Adept: 1 free level of Improved Ability for a skill in the Acting or Influence skill group

mentors.name: Shark
mentors.advantage: All: +2 dice to Unarmed Combat tests.
mentors.disadvantage: You might go berserk when you take Physical damage in combat. Every time it happens, make a Simple Charisma + Willpower Test (wound modifiers apply). You go berserk for 3 turns minus 1 turn per hit, so 3 or more hits averts the berserk rage entirely. If you're already going berserk, increase the duration. When you're berserk, you go after your attacker(s) without regard for your own safety. If you run out of targets before the time's up, you keep attacking their bodies.

choices.name: Magician: +2 dice for Combat spells
Adept: Free Killing Hands

mentors.name: Snake
mentors.advantage: All: +2 to Arcana tests.
mentors.disadvantage: You must succeed in a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test to avoid pursuing secrets or knowledge that few people know about when you receive hints of its existence.

choices.name: Magician: +2 dice for Detection spells
Adept: 2 free levels of Kinesics

mentors.name: Spider
mentors.advantage: All: +2 dice to Computer skill tests
mentors.disadvantage: Followers of Spider are already paranoid about people having any misconceptions about them being insect shamans. They will keep such details from casual conversation. Followers of Spider also have taken advantage of the Matrix more than more traditional shamans in creating connections. This makes followers more agoraphobic as they avoid uncontrolled social situations and unfamiliar environments. They receive a –1 dice pool modifier to Magic tests while out in the open (this includes very large indoor rooms such as auditoriums, theaters, and stadiums). The penalty doubles if there is a large crowd of people to deal with.

choices.name: Magician: +2 dice for Illusion spells
Adept: Hang time (2)

mentors.name: Spider (Alt)
mentors.advantage: All: +2 dice pool modifier for tests using the Stealth skill group.
mentors.disadvantage: When not following a plan or a plan doesn't go according to plan, followers of Spider must pass a Charisma + Willpower (4) Test or suffer –2 to all rolls until a new plan is established.

choices.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifier when casting Manipulation spells, preparations, and rituals
Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Spirit Claw (although in this case, it manifests as a fang).

mentors.name: Squirrel
mentors.advantage: All: +2 dice pool modifier for tests using the Gymnastics skill.
mentors.disadvantage: When followers of Squirrel are in confined spaces, they must make a Willpower + Charisma (3) Tests or take a -1 dice pool modifier on all tests while feeling cramped.

choices.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifier when casting Detection spells, preparations, and rituals
Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Light Body.

mentors.name: Stag
mentors.advantage: All: +2 to Blades tests.
mentors.disadvantage: Followers of the Stag demand respect, especially to those they give it to. Once disrespected, they must succeed in a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test, or they will demand satisfaction against the slight.

choices.name: Magician: +2 to summoning earth spirits.
Adept: Gain +2 levels of Light Body for free.

mentors.name: Sun
mentors.advantage: All: +2 dice pool modifier for Perception tests when outside during the day.
mentors.disadvantage: Followers of Sun must pass a Charisma + Willpower (4) Test in order to purposefully deceive others.

choices.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifier when casting Sun- or Fire-based spells.
Adept: Gain 3 free levels of Temperature Tolerance

mentors.name: The Adversary
mentors.advantage: All: +2 dice to demolitions tests.
mentors.disadvantage: Because of their deep-seated hatred for authority, a teammate's use of leadership skill is counterproductive to followers of Adversary, invoking either a negative dice penalty or loss of initiative. If the plan doesn't go the way that the adversary follower wants it to go, it takes a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test for him to get him to cooperate.

choices.name: Magician: +2 dice for Counterspelling and disenchanting
Adept: 1 free level of Iron Will

mentors.name: Thunderbird
mentors.advantage: All: +2 dice for Intimidation Tests.
mentors.disadvantage: A Thunderbird magician must succeed in a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test to avoid responding to an insult in kind.

choices.name: Magician: +2 dice for summoning spirits of air
Adept: 1 free level of Critical Strike

mentors.name: Tide
mentors.advantage: All: +2 dice pool modifier for tests using the Ritual Spellcasting skill.
mentors.disadvantage: Followers of Tide live in transition, but in the consistency of a cycle. They also design their lives this way. If their normal life cycle is lastingly impaired by Sleep deprivation or illness, they suffer a -1 dice pool modifier on all tests until the cycle is restored.

choices.name: Magician: +2 dice summoning spirits of water or earth (The type of spirit for which this bonus applies changes every 6 hours).
Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Heightened Concentration.

mentors.name: Tohu Wa-Bohu
mentors.advantage: All: +2 dice pool modifier for Intimidation or Demolitions tests (choose one)
mentors.disadvantage: Followers gain the Driven quality, in which the focus is the opportunity to destroy something meaningful. Further, they fnd it hard to work in groups given their destructive nature. They can never benefit from teamwork or leadership bonuses.

choices.name: Magician: Gain the Witness My Hate quality for free.
Adept: Gain the Adept Accident power for free.

mentors.name: Treasure Hunter
mentors.advantage: All: +1 die to Navigation and Locksmith
mentors.disadvantage: A follower of this spirit devotes their full attention to the desired object, as a result, slacking or tackling tasks not directly related to obtaining it in a halfhearted fashion. After the meet with the J, they must succeed at a WIL + WIL (3) test or incur a -1 penalty to all tests which don't directly involve the object of their desire.

choices.name: Magician: +2 dice for Detection spells
Adept: Gain Three-Dimensional Memory for free

mentors.name: War
mentors.advantage: All: After character creation, may purchase combat skills at rank 3 or higher for 1 less Karma
mentors.disadvantage: If it looks as if they are going to lose a battle, those with the War mentor must pass a Charisma + Willpower (4) Test, or else use all means necessary—including the lives, nuyen, and honor of their teammates—to overcome their adversary.

choices.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifier when casting Combat spells, preparations, and rituals.
Adept: Gain 1 free level of Critical Strike.

mentors.name: Weimaraner
mentors.advantage: All: +1 die to Running and Tracking
mentors.disadvantage: Should a follower find themselves unable to use their skills for longer than 12 hours, they must succeed  a WIL + CHA (3) test, otherwise they suffer a -1 penalty to all actions until they can use their abilities again.

choices.name: Magician: +2 dice for Detection spells
Adept: 1 free level of Enhanced Perception

mentors.name: Whale
mentors.advantage: All: +2 dice to Swimming or Pilot Watercraft skill tests (choose one)
mentors.disadvantage: Because of their personal sense of ethics, followers of the whale must honor any agreement they enter into. This can be an oath to an organization or a verbal contract with a corporation. Failing to honor the contract or oath results in a loss of a point of Magic. The Whale mentor spirit understands if circumstances to complete the contract are out of the Awakened's hands. For everything else, the follower can attempt to atone, but at the gamemaster's discretion.

choices.name: +2 dice on Swimming tests
+2 on Pilot Watercraft Tests
Magician: +2 to Conjuring skill tests for spirits of water
Adept: Receive 2 ranks in Iron Lungs or free.

mentors.name: Wild Hunt
mentors.advantage: All: +2 dice pool modifier for tests using the Pilot Ground Craft or Intimidation skill.
mentors.disadvantage: A follower of the Wild Hunt always leaves behind a swath of devastation. If objects or uninvolved persons could be harmed in the fight, he wouldn't take any consideration. If a follower of the Wild Hunt is consciously considerate in the fight, he must succeed in a Charisma + Willpower (3) test, otherwise he is so inhibited that he suffers a -2 dicepool modifier on all actions.

choices.name: +2 dice on Pilot Ground Craft Tests
+2 dice on Intimidation Tests
Magician: +2 dice summoning spirits of man.
Magician: +2 dice summoning guardian spirits.
Adept: Gain the Berserk power for free.

mentors.name: Wise Warrior
mentors.advantage: All: +2 to dice to Leadership or Instruction skill tests (choose one).
mentors.disadvantage: If you act dishonorably or without courtesy, whether by choice or by accident, you take a –1 dice pool modifier to all actions until you atone for your behavior.

choices.name: +2 dice for Leadership skill tests
+2 dice for Instruction skill tests
Magician: +2 dice for Combat spells
Adept: 1 free level of Improved Ability on a Combat skill

mentors.name: Wolf
mentors.advantage: All: +2 dice to Tracking tests.
mentors.disadvantage: You must succeed in a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test to retreat from a fight.

choices.name: Magician: +2 dice for Combat spells
Adept: 2 free levels of Attribute Boost (Agility)

mentors.name: Wolf (Alt)
mentors.advantage: All: +1 dice pool modifier for tests using the Sneaking, Perception, Survival, and Tracking skills.
mentors.disadvantage: Whenever a follower of Wolf sees an opportunity to survive by attacking or sacrificing the weak, they must pass a Charisma + Willpower (4) Test or attempt to seize the opportunity. This does not apply to those the Wolf considers friends or family.

choices.name: Magician: +1 dice pool modifier when casting Combat spells, preparations, and rituals.
Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Danger Sense.
